mapper.select: SELECT B.MEMBER_NAME AS memberName , B.MEMBER_ID AS memberId , J.JOB_NAME AS JobName , J.JOB_ID AS jobId , B.MEMBER_IMAGE_PATH AS memberImagePath FROM MOIM M JOIN MOIM_PARTICIPANTS P ON M.MOIM_ID = P.MOIM_ID JOIN MEMBERS B ON B.MEMBER_ID = P.MEMBER_ID JOIN JOBS J ON P.JOB_ID = J.JOB_ID WHERE M.MOIM_ID IN (SELECT P.MOIM_ID FROM MOIM_PARTICIPANTS P WHERE P.MOIM_ID = #{id})
SELECT MEMBER_ID AS memberId ,MOIM_ID AS moimId ,JOB_ID AS jobId FROM MOIM_PARTICIPANTS WHERE MOIM_ID = #{moimId} AND MEMBER_ID = #{memberId}
